extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Values are means±SD. *GDS involves 30-item questions; †Scores of neuropsychological tests are shown in percentile scores. NC, normal controls; SMI, subjective memory impairment; MCI, mild cognitive impairment; GDS, geriatric depression scale; K-MMSE, Korean version of the Mini-Mental State Examination; CDR, clinical dementia rating; CDR-SB, CDR-sum of boxes; RCFT, Rey complex figure test; COWAT, controlled oral word association test.
